# 0013: Gakona # 0006: Aurora and airglow # 0207: EMCCD Camera, Cam ID 7 (100 Hz) 10.34515/DATA.GND-0013-0006-0207_v01 https://www.isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp/doi/10.34515/DATA_GND-0013-0006-0207_v01.html
100 Hz EMCCD all-sky camera data of PWING project at the Gakona station 100 Hz EMCCD ASI data at GAK
Study of dynamical variation of particles and waves in the inner magnetosphere using ground-based network observations (PWING) Optical observation of aurora All-sky imager data 100 Hz raw image

RAW
Shiokawa, K., Y. Kato, Y. Hamaguchi, Y. Yamamoto, T. Adachi, M. Ozaki, S.-I. Oyama, M. Nos√©, et al. (2017), Ground-based instruments of the PWING project to investigate dynamics of the inner magnetosphere at subauroral latitudes as a part of the ERG-ground coordinated observation network, Earth Planets Space, 69:160, doi: 10.1186/s40623-017-0745-9. Hosokawa et al. (2021), A ground-based instrument suite for integrated high-time resolution measurements of pulsating aurora with Arase, doi:10.1002/essoar. 10504721.1
en
2021-05-31 (version: v01)
100 Hz sampling raw all-sky image data
Rules-of-the-Road for PsA/PWING EMCCD Camera + PsA Magnetometer
The dataset includes 100 Hz sampling optical intensity data from the EMCCD camera, which are archived in the raw format data files. The data files can be accessed with various data analysis software such as SPEDAS as well as with web browsers.
62.39 214.78 Gakona, Alaska, U.S.A.
Japan Society for the Promotion of Science (JSPS) https://doi.org/10.13039/501100001691 16H06286
